#summary Arduino Tone Generator Library.

= Arduino Tone Library Usage =



== Instantiation ==

{{{

Tone notePlayer;

void setup(void)
{
  notePlayer.begin(13);
}

}}}


== Properties ==
 * No properties.

== Methods ==
 * <tt>[begin()]</tt> - prepares a pin for playing a tone.
 * <tt>[isPlaying()]</tt> - returns <tt>true</tt> if tone is playing, <tt>false</tt> if not.
 * <tt>[play()]</tt> - play a tone.
 * <tt>[stop()]</tt> - stop playing a tone.
